about_the_game:
Experience the universe in gold!
Upgrade your spacecrafts to Gold at the beginning of each run!
A cool golden look spacecraft and a golden factory software to choose:
  • Lonsdaleite Coating - 20% health increase.
  • Tachyon Engine - 20% speed increase.
  • Tsar Configuration - 20% damage increase.
  • Overclocking - +4 ram.

Features

  • - Golden mode for every unlocked spacecraft.
  • - A Golden factory software to choose at the beginning of each run.
  • - Gold UI option.
  • - 5 Cartridges usages for each consumable in the game!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8000, ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series, Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Lion
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8000, ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series, Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

name: Stellar Interface - Golden Interface

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8000, ATI Radeon HD 4800 Series, Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
